author: Shawn Mills
comment: Convenient, easy to use, and quality. No issues so far and I really enjoy it.

author: Thomas Winston
comment: Best security people can have. See them before they see you.

author: Jason White
comment: Everyone should use this app.

author: Tamikia Hartfield
comment: Good alarm system

author: Tim Klein
comment: Great app

author: Travis Pendleton
comment: Awesome

author: Sean Gaither
comment: It was a rough start.... In the begin, which was approx 4 years ago. The systems had a lot of issues that needed to be worked out. But after the improvements that Vivint had made, our home security system is flawless. I'm am very please with the company as a whole. Thank you Driving for the peace of mind.

author: Oz Free
comment: Updated on 2/5/18, more unresponsive than last version.  My wife would Arm/Disarm system, it still shows on my phone as Armed/Disarmed and often shows as no internet connection. I have to restart the app for it to show the correct status.  It's very annoying, needs another update asap!

author: Frank Aguirre
comment: For as long as I had it (2 yrs) it was ok. But as soon as I had a problem I could not get any help. They so called monitor the system but couldn't tell that it wasn't working. So glad nothing happen at the house because they couldn't tell me. Suggest you all check

author: Michael Brown
comment: Poor connection and very inconsistent.  The claim to be on 4g is false (yet charged) and I have yet to see live when the doorbell is rung. "Not connected to Wi-Fi....?"  I really feel like I've been cheated. Sorry.

author: Rosa Hernandez
comment: This silly app only works if you have wifi for the panel at home really!? They never told me about that (supposedly the panel had internet) until now that I'm stuck in a contract so 🤔 better watch before it happens to you I can't kick this service if I do I have to pay for two years more plus whatever they add🙄😡😠

Love Vivint service and their camera clarity but the app is garbage! By the time the app loads for visitor or camera triggers people are long gone. The app also has a full 1 day delay for video playback! door bell cams are best but they only give ONE per home...I have 3300 Sq ft and 4 doors one camera limit is disappointing.

I hate this app!  It takes forever for the video feed at my front door to pull up on my phone (Samsung Galaxy S7 Active).  And sometimes it won't pull up at all, even when connected to WiFi.  People that come to my door are long gone before I can ever get a live signal to see who was there.  My Vivint system at home sucks too.   I constantly have to reboot my doorbell cam because it stops working all of the sudden, and often have to reboot my entire system because it starts to act buggy.  There is also such a lag time in the doorbell cam from when it detects a visitor, to the time it starts recording, that when I try to go back and see who was there, it won't show them if they came and left quickly, or it will only show their back for a split second as they walk out of view.  I've had it with this system.  When my contract is up it's bye bye Vivint!

author: Anthony Vasquez
comment: I been having problem with vivint home sicurity since i had it installed. They blame me internet service. I had the internet company come out and check what was going on and everything on there end is just fine. My cameras keep going offline for hours. My space monkey that is suppose to record everything doesnt.  Iv had there service for over 6 months now and I regret ever install the system at my home. I tried to return the system but the wont take it back.    Stay away is the only advice i can give you. Purchase at your own risk!!

author: Cody Gideon
comment: I am giving 3 stars because I love the security system but the app sucks. The cameras are very good quality and the doorbell is nice. The app is slow and crashes all the time. It is up to date. I am on an LG v20.

author: Teresa D'Angelo
comment: When my glass break alarm is activated they call me within seconds. Great customer service. This app allows me to lock/unlock my doors, view my house interior and adjust my thermostat remotely. Fantastic.

author: Leonardo Escoliarth
comment: Vivint is a shady company and will screw you in any way possible. I made the mistake of trusting this company. Lesson learned. I'll make sure it never happens again to myself, my family or friends. Vivint paid for a 4.6 star review. Vivint is a pretty image but it's realistically horrible.

author: Joshua Cusenbary
comment: It would be a pretty good app at arming and disarming the house, and review camera footage but every time I'm in the app it crashes, freezes, or causes the pad in the house to disconnect from the wifi.. is extremely frustrating.

author: Carrie McNemar
comment: I do like the updated app but I was happy with the original app. I will say it seems to operate kind of sluggish at times but overall it's good!  I would like to see an annual home appliance inspection. That way any new modifications that need to be addressed can be.

author: William Hickey Jr.
comment: I don't know what's going on, but everytime I go to view my cameras while I'm out of town they seem not to be working. It's just becoming frustrating and aggravating that I can't use something that I pay for every month when I want to use it.

author: James Chism
comment: Overall, it's a great app. Runs slow sometimes even with WiFi. That makes for an inconvenience, and it is why I did not give it 5 stars.

author: Gary McCay
comment: Although with a few minor glitches,  this app is impressive,  not to mention the security system itself! Through communication with a VERY helpful app staff,  I anticipate a revision 🔜 being released soon,  which will polish this app even further!

author: David Arensdorff
comment: Update 2/3/18: There have since been several updates to the app that have minimized my original issues. They do still occur, but I'm able to connect after a close and reopen of the app or bouncing between cameras or different screens within the app itself. Good to see progress bring made. And for what it's worth, Vivint development team contacted me directly to discuss the issues I was having. Good to see a company listening to their customers!  ____________________________________ App sucks! I'm unable to view my doorbell camera and when it does come online I can't hear audio or talk thru the microphone. Constantly does "reconnecting audio" message. Please update ASAP!!

App glitches all the time. I can hardly view video feed as it's happening.  When I get a doorbell alert, the person at the door is already gone by the time the live camera loads.  When checking in on the other cameras, I get the same problem.  Occasionally, I can't even talk through the cameras.  Its also horrible about recording clips on motion. Some days I'll have hardly any feed recorded and some days I'll have everything down to a switch of a light recorded.  Other than that, the panel at home works great. The app itself is horrible.   *Running on Samsung Note8 with 4G service  I should add that I am satisfied with Vivint.  The security system has been a great peace of mind. I have had no problems with the system or Vivnts customer service.  Anytime there is an alert, they are always very quick to respond.   My review is for the app only.
Everything's fine except for the cameras. Once it finally loads it is very choppy which makes it useless. I have 60 mbps download speed.

author: Clemmett Forrest
comment: I have not been able to connect the app to my phone has anyone else had this problem I really need help, I don't have mobile acess.

author: Kyle Kos
comment: The doorbell camera only works when it wants to.  It will record saying visitor detected and its just a car driving by, but half the time when someone walks up it doesn't take a video.  We just got our car stolen out of our driveway and of course somehow it never detected a visitor , so it didn't record. And when we called they said sorry we can't see anything even though the guy told us theres constant video going.  They also never told us that you can't leave the contract. And also never told us that if we paid a little extra a month we wont have to pay when they have to come out and replace something that's not our fault.  So thanks for being a completely useless security company.

author: Denny Lajeunese
comment: Was working but latest update, once you enter login info the app will crash at start.  Please fix ASAP!

author: Lee Higginson
comment: I use the app every day.  Love checking from work to see what the weather is like at my place or just turning up the heat from my couch.

author: Charae T
comment: The app is very user friendly however you do experience some glitches with not loading the video feed and lagging over all I'm satisfied.

author: Keith Cadell
comment: No matter where I am, whether I'm on Wi-Fi or not.  I can never get video feed when I need it

author: Charles Hill
comment: Google Home and assistant now links with Vivint. It will only close garage door and will not open it.  Don't understand why opening garage by voice is a security issue. Google still gets confused sometimes but it works.

author: Sasha Reedus
comment: I like it,sometimes its slow when uploading or says offline when i have wifi and my speed is 60. But it works,so far so good

author: Kathi Sherburne
comment: Great being able to check on my husband when I have to go out...he had a massive stroke 3 years ago...so it puts my mind at ease.  Highly recommend it.

author: Chris Erwin
comment: App is buggy, be nice if all components worked more than 50% of the time.

author: Jay Helman
comment: When I went to make an online payment last month they took out an extra month and refused to give it back. Stay away from Vivint! They are a shady company with long expensive contracts that you cant cancel. BUYER BEWARE! Check the BBB for all the info you need about Vivint.

author: Gil Smith II
comment: Love the app. Also love the fact that I'm able to control my nest thermostat from within this app. Sometimes it wont update until I force it to (i.e., I'll arm my home but the app will still show that it's unarmed), but other than that, it's great!

author: Jennifer Stephens
comment: Cant connect half the time, can take several minutes to connect to doorbell camera, which defeats the purpose

author: kerri raine
comment: Very alert response, once alarm sounds.very, very nice & respectful representatives & installers. Very informative about their equipment. Had a home invasion with cox equipment & I upgraded & feel better & safe!!!!

author: Brenda A
comment: The app hasn't been working properly , it closes it self and it gives a message saying to re start the app ... also i can't playback my video feed?
